backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing storage, access control, approval workflows, user profiles, and file/folder metadata management with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component controlling authentication, access checks, profile flow, query cleanup, and rendering of the main file-management UI.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: UI component showing a pending-approval screen with copyable principal ID and instructions for requesting admin access.
Empty placeholder file for the AdminManagement component.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Large file/folder management UI handling browsing, search, uploads, deletion, previews, navigation, and breadcrumb/path resolution.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal component that loads and previews various file types with navigation, fullscreen, and zoom support.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty file placeholder, no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with branding, version info, and external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, user profile display, admin tools, and theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin panel for managing members, roles, storage stats, and member removal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: User onboarding form to choose and validate a unique username before saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to switch between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanViewer.ts: Container providing zoom and pan interactions for wrapped content.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Hook that initializes access control once per session and refreshes related query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handles identity loading, login, logout, and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for calling backend actor methods related to user roles, profiles, approval, files, and search operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Retrieves backend and frontend canister IDs from various environment sources with multiple fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/dragDropDirectory.ts: Handles extracting files and directory contents from drag‑and‑drop events, supporting recursive traversal.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Builds full direct file URLs and provides clipboard copying utilities with fallbacks and notifications.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Provides helpers to extract extensions, determine MIME types and previewability, and map file extensions to readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/folderNavigation.ts: Utilities for resolving folder paths, building breadcrumbs, and navigating or locating folders and file parent folders.
frontend/src/lib/folderUpload.ts: Validates folder uploads, creates nested folders, and uploads files recursively with progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Normalizes strings for case- and diacritics-insensitive search and checks substring inclusion.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Builds a set of folder IDs representing all descendants of a given folder using a parent–child index.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, plugins, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Captures current project state, known issues, and feature requests for version 0.3.91.
